<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Briefing

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Teams

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Create a new AI task (subtask of parentTask). Type is name of registered task type.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> sender '''sendTask''' [receiver,[type] or [type,parentTask],priority,name1,value1,name2,value2,...]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> sender:  [[Team Member]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [receiver,[type] or [type,parentTask],priority,name1,value1,name2,value2,...]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Task]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>(example)</code>
</value></part></template>
